title: 120. 100 Ways to Fight Obesity
description: Freakonomics asks a dozen smart people for their best ideas. Get ready for a fat tax, a sugar ban, and a calorie-chomping tapeworm.
author: editor@freakonomics.com (Freakonomics Radio + Stitcher)
